alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 14 at 1:00PM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Chiricahua, Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains. * WHEN...Strongest wind speeds during the effective period of the warning will be tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will damage carports, awnings, trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Secure trash cans...lawn furniture...and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. High winds can topple trees...blow weakened roofs off outbuildings...and down power lines. Use extreme caution when driving.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon
